text: The Harder They Come is a 1972 Jamaican crime drama movie directed by Perry Henzell and starring Jimmy Cliff, Carl Bradshaw, Prince Buster, Ras Daniel Heartman, Leslie Kong, Winston Stona. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 crime drama movies Category:Jamaican movies Category:Movies set in Jamaica Category:Movies about singers
title: The Harder They Come
